summary: Logo/design project: refine the premium-style logo to convey empowerment, strong market-entry/leadership, growth to top level, and being on the consumer’s side (ocean-themed identity).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Ocean-themed premium logo social image, wide composition, clean vector-like shapes, transparent or solid background as appropriate (ocean-empowerer-solutions-logo-empowerment.dim_512x256.png)

## Edit Images
- Empowerment-focused ocean identity with an upward growth/leadership cue; keep premium minimal geometry and deep navy + subtle metallic gold accent (premium-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png > premium-logo-horizontal-empowerment.dim_512x128.png)
- Matching square icon variant with the same ocean empowerment mark; strong legibility at small sizes (premium-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png > premium-logo-icon-empowerment.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create an updated ocean-themed brand logo concept that visually communicates empowerment, confident market entry/leadership ("we own the market"), upward growth to the top level, and being on the consumer’s side, while keeping the current premium/clean style.

Update the site to use the new logo assets consistently in the header and footer by changing the image src paths currently pointing to /assets/generated/premium-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png to the newly generated empowerment logo asset.

Update SEO/logo metadata to match the new brand logo asset(s): update Organization structured data logo URL and the index.html Open Graph/Twitter image URL to use the new generated logo/social image asset.
Ensure all newly generated logo image assets are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly as static assets (no backend involvement).

new_feature_requests.summary: Revise logo concept to communicate empowerment in an ocean-themed identity, signaling confident market entry/ownership, upward growth to top level, and consumer-centric values while keeping the current style.

projectName: Revise ocean-themed logo to communicate empowerment, growth, and market leadership
